title: Fort McHenry National Monument and Historic Shrine: Lodging
body: Lodging       Visit Baltimore - The Official Tourism Site for Baltimore With all there is to do and see in Baltimore, it's just too much fun for just one day. So why not spend a few days with us? Our city, famed for its old-time Southern hospitality, has just the place for you to stayâ€”from swanky to budget, chic to quirky.
